title: Guerlain Typeface
content:
Hi everyone!  
Does anyone knows which typeface is used in this product of Guerlain?  
 [http://www.guerlain.com/int/en-int/eau-de-parfum-couture](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416041424/http:/www.guerlain.com/int/en-int/eau-de-parfum-couture "http://www.guerlain.com/int/en-int/eau-de-parfum-couture") (la petite robe noire)  
And about thei logo, do you think is a combination of a typeface or not?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416041424im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1888662_10152400879793455_669167091_n_3605.png)
author: desi87
